channel.title: ansible on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on Barefoot Rob

item.title: AWS Deploy Redmine for Apache2 with Ansible on Ubuntu 16.04
got some cool ansible stuff working
item.description: 14:13 Wednesday 24 August 2016 JST Though I need to redact some names before making it public source, I got a pretty cool VagrantFile which uses Ansible to create an instance on AWS. The starting point was here https://github.com/thunderrabbit/episode-45 (actually here https://github.com/jweissig/episode-45) and I might spend time to put a cleansed version of my new repo online. Gotta go to work now though.

item.title: ansible weekend
item.description: 10:44 Monday 20 June 2016 JST This weekend, I went through the excellent Ansible Tutorial on Code Review Videos. I had gone through most of it in January, and this refresher helped me grok it more.
